attributes.title: Gen Z- New American Patriots
attributes.review: I am so proud of our politically involved youth. This is a great non violent, well thought out way to effectively get at a vindictive man and his baseless threats. Good luck and keep up with the brilliant work.

attributes.title: Trump is trash, how come he hasnâ€™t been taken out yet?
i am scared for my life
attributes.review: This app in all seriousness promotes Satan aka Lucifer aka the Devil. It downloaded right away which was nice the other reviews with the colorful emoji pictures kept suggesting it would take days to download which was honestly very confusing..but it downloaded within a minute everything was fine. It started after I gave the app my phone number..I started to receive incoherent messages that looked like weird almagamations of Latin and Hebrew. At first I didnâ€™t mind I just assumed President Trump was being inclusive. The same message started to send to me hourly. â€œhoc rubeum ad se vocantem ×”××“×•× ×§×•×¨× ×œ×‘×¨×š ××ª ×‘× ×• ×”××“×•× ×§×•×¨× ×œ×‘×¨×š ××ª ×‘× ×•â€ I went to my local priest for help with the translation. He told me not to worry and that the translation roughly means â€œThe red one is coming. Welcome his son.â€ After I walked back home from the chapel I noticed my skin starting to glow an unnatural shade of orange. I know no one will believe me but I genuinely think something behind this app is demonic. Iâ€™ve started to receive these texts hourly â€œ ×œ×¦×™×™×ª ×œ×—×•×§×™× ×©×œ×•â€ â€œobey his rules.â€ I was sent a selfie of President Trump which at first I thought was just him being cute and friendly. Iâ€™ve been receiving this same selfie for the past few days. Each time President Trump is â€œeditedâ€ to look stranger and stranger. Iâ€™ll leave it to your imagination. As I type this my skin has turned completely orange and I donâ€™t know why. Maybe this is part of some elaborate prank. Maybe the app got hacked in which case I hope they fix it as soon as possible.
